txt.en: <rgb=#00ff00>Shakalog has fallen!</rgb>
Battle at the Forge
Talk to Agátur the Boastful
'The forges of Gundabad are under attack! The forces there must be defeated if we are to keep our hold on Gundabad!\n\n'Will you travel there and see this threat banished?'
<rgb=#FF0000>Enemy forces have renewed their assault upon the eastern forges!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ff00>Velzájar has fallen!</rgb>
Agátur the Boastful can be found at Zidir-nesad, The Steepset in Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Agátur the Boastful and enter the fray in order to complete some of his tasks.
<rgb=#FF0000>Enemy forces have renewed their assault upon the northern forges!</rgb>
'Go and protect the forges!'
'You have dealt a mighty blow to our enemies! They had better not try anything like that again or they shall surely meet the same fate!'
<rgb=#00ff00>Shakalog has fallen!</rgb>
Complete Quest 'Battle at the Forge: Orcs and Grims'
A planned assault against enemy forces at the Forges of Gundabad is underway, but the battle will not be won without additional reinforcements.
Complete Quest 'Battle at the Forge: Fire-drakes'
<rgb=#FF0000>The terrible Shakalog has entered the fray!</rgb>
Complete Quest 'Battle at the Forge: Fire-trolls'
You should return to Agátur the Boastful and apprise him of your efforts.
<rgb=#FF0000>The terrible Shakalog has entered the fray!</rgb>
Complete Quest 'Battle at the Forge: Velzájar'
<rgb=#00ff00>Shakalog has fallen!</rgb>
Complete Quest 'Battle at the Forge: Shakalog'
